summary: Assemble your team of Heroes, choose from hundreds of skills, and unleash them to defeat your opponents! Elemental Raiders is a fast-paced, strategic hero battler that will challenge your tactical prowess. Join the fight & save Runaria!

name: Elf World Adventure: Part 1
summary: You are gamer who likes to play computer games. One day, returning home from the store, along the way you became a victim of an accident. At the last moment you think that your story is over, but some force has given you a second chance in another world that is completely different from yours.

name: Electronauts
summary: Immerse yourself in an interactive sonic environment where you build, drop, remix, and jam with your friends and top artists. Upload sounds, create songs, crush sets, and express yourself like never before. Electronauts sets the stage for you to DJ, perform, and make music magic in virtual reality.

name: Element X
summary: Element X is a hardcore roguelite bullet hell. Challenge ruthless enemies and claim your high score!

name: Elite Soccer
summary: Elite Soccer was also released for the Game Boy. Developed by Denton Designs, it was also published in Japan by Coconuts Japan as "World Cup Striker", and in Europe as "Soccer".

name: Elementowers
summary: Co-op tower defense where you don't have to build towers and just watch the battle. Get directly involved in combat. Team up with you friend in the war against the great evil that seized the kingdom!

name: Election Town
summary: Election Town is a humorous small-town life simulator with a political twist. Build and decorate the house of your dreams, make decisions that will shape the city, and take your part in the election against the current Mayor. It’s Election time and your choices matter most!

name: Elite: The New Kind
summary: A notable clone of the original space trading sim.

name: Eliss Infinity
summary: Use your fingers to control all the planets, fuse planets together until they become giant, or split them into halves until they become tiny, you're in charge of this reactive universe. Just don't let different colors touch!

name: Electric Crayon: Fun on the Farm
summary: Electric Crayon: Fun on the Farm is a video game for kids.

name: Eledive
summary: Tilt controlled puzzle game for the PlayStation Vita.

name: Elektronika 24-01. Igra na ekrane: Mickey Mouse
Elise's Peepshow
summary: Elise has a confession, she likes to be watched! Exhibitionism and voyeurism combine in this erotic adult game, playable on desktop and VR. Take photos, watch the action, or be part of it!

name: Elmo's Kangaroo of the damned: Punishment Edition
summary: Your name is Elmo. You have a kangaroo. Your kangaroo is missing. GET... IT... BACK!

name: Eleazar
summary: A puzzle platformer about corpses, crossbows, and endless cycles.

name: Elumin
summary: Worker of honor from Lindenauw, you are mandated on the Tswinoberg exploitation site. A first person exploration experience.

name: Eldorado FPS
summary: Eldorado FPS: A thrilling FPS adventure with diverse modes - Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Capture the Flag, Gun Mode, and Zombie Survival. Customize load-outs, compete globally, and rise in the ranks. Intense action, strategy, and endless fun await!

name: Ellan: The Lost Soul
summary: Ellan is a beautiful first-person adventure game about the journey beyond life, Traveling with a light companion in dream-like worlds, and uncovering the meaning of eternal by overcoming the illusion of choice to light the path to Moksha.

name: Elroi: Defense War
summary:
Go on an adventurous expedition to pioneer a new continent. Pioneer a new continent by fostering your characters and executing various strategies.

Summon your characters with a simple touch, defeat monsters, and destroy enemy towers to discover amazing artifacts.
Collect artifacts to grow your team, and hire and nurture powerful heroes and master characters.

name: Elements of Dreams
summary: Elements of Dreams is pixel art action role playing game (much like the original Legend of Zelda). Play as the heroine who must discover four unique powers in order to defeat her nightmares and find her purpose.

name: Electricman 2: The Tournament of Voltagen
summary: The Tournament of Voltagen is the combat tournament you fight your way through in Electric Man. The game features many different locations, each unique to the enemy being fought.

name: ElementalsFight
summary: ElementalsFight is a real-time strategy game where you only need to control one fighter. It is an independent sequel to the popular Warcraft III mod - Castle Fight.

name: Element Z
summary: Element Z is a point and click game situated in a unique universe with great challenges for those who like a good story.

name: Elon's Dream 2
summary: A new part of the indie platformer with a side view once again challenges players, this time you will have to cope with a naughty jetpack in conditions of limited visibility, avoid collisions with meteors and spatial holes, and all this, as always, in conditions of limited fuel reserves.

name: Elevatium: Puzzle of Atlantis
summary: Elevatium: Puzzle of Atlantis is a mobile exploration and logic puzzle game.

name: Elemental Heroes: Blue Fighter 20th Level Set
summary: Blue Fighter Set of 20th level with random parameters for Elemental Heroes

name: Elon
summary: After a mysterious accident you are left are stranded, floating through space on a piece of a space station. Craft supplies and Hubs to expand what is now your home. But be warned space is a dangerous places where one mistake can mean certain death. Can you defy the odds and survive in space?

name: Elfland
summary: Clone of the 1992 game of the same name. Despite using the same graphics as the original, it is not based on the same engine, and was ported from scratch. It is unknown if JungleTac's version was a licensed port or not.

name: Ell's Kitchen
summary:
Ever wanted to be the host of an online cooking show?

Here's your chance to experience the joys of cooking for an audience.

Play as Elliot, our chef and host of the not-yet-popular youtube series: Ell's Kitchen, as she cooks her friend's favourite foods in her girlfriend's kitchen.

name: Elastic Fantastic
summary: Elastic Fantastic is a very difficult physics-platformer with a challenging game mechanic.

name: Elevate: Brain Training
summary:
Elevate is a brain training program designed to improve your mind’s focus, memory, speaking abilities, processing speed, math skills, and more. Each person is provided with a personalized training program that adjusts over time to maximize results.
The more you train with Elevate, the more you’ll improve critical cognitive skills that are proven to boost productivity, earning power, and self-confidence. 90%+ report improved vocabulary, math skills, and overall mental sharpness when they frequently use Elevate.

name: Elleros Openworld
summary: Experience the land of Elleros, a complete open world for you to explore in any way you choose. From exploring ancient caves to battling corrupted necromancers, Elleros enables you to play the way you choose. Every 400 years a cataclysm wipes out all life. The last cataclysm was 399 years ago.

name: Elemix!
summary: Elemix! is an Adventure game, developed and published by SIMS, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Elven Legend
summary: ELven Legend is the exciting time-management strategy in a fantasy world, where an evil witch has captured lords of Elven Kingdom.

name: Elemdian
summary: RPG that combines exploration with magic combat. Unfurl your claws as a powerful werewolf warrior wielding the power of the Elegems! A journey to find the Elegems, unleash devastating spells, and unravel the mysteries of Morrok.

name: Electronics Circuits Simulator
summary: Learn electronic circuits in a new and exciting way.

name: Elo Hell: Episodes 1-5
summary: This DLC includes episodes 1-5 of the game, all of which will be out by September 2019.

name: Eleven Beat World Tournament
summary: An arcade football game featuring international teams. Play a friendly against a friend or play a tournament against CPU players.

name: Elmarion: Dragon's Princess
summary: Elmarion: Dragon’s Princess is an RPG about a Dragon and a Princess. A player plays as a Dragon: flies across a large 3D world, burns whole armies of people, explores interesting locations. Aim of the game: to save the world of Dragons and people together with the Princess.

name: Elude
summary: Elude is a simple, yet challenging endless survival/arcade game. It will test all of your abilities to escape from the enemies or lead them intro traps.

name: Elemental Ninja
summary: Elemental Ninja is a 3D action game from Red Stomp Studio.

name: Elsewhere in the Night
summary: Elsewhere in the Night is a 2D psychic noir point and click adventure game. Play as private detective Lady Tick Tock as she investigates the latest in a string of unsolved murders.

name: Elthinia
summary: Welcome to the world of Elthinia, a fantasy RPG set in a wondrous world of epic adventure, where your wits and heart are as important as your skill with a blade and the strength of your spellshield. Elthinia offers hours of enjoyment as you explore the far reaches of the land in search of a way to stop the mad Archmage Salek Sar from releasing the Goddess of Destruction unto the world. You'll discover more souls willing to fight and die by your side as you venture forth in your quest to stop the mad man. As the dangers grow so will the strength of your arms as you venture into deeper into the realm and uncover treasures and artifacts long since forgotten, relics of history that will aid you in your fight against the Goddess and her minions.

name: Elroy Hits the Pavement
summary: In the second in the "What the heck will Elroy do next" adventure series, Elroy's dog Blue has been kidnapped by a criminal gang. They've also stolen his school science project, the Canine Revitalizer. If his friend Sydney and he don't find it and hand it in, they'll get sent to Summer school.

name: Elon vs AI
summary: Elon vs AI is a 3D arena shooter in which you have to play as a warrior on a large arena, shooting persistent robots, gaining experience, improving skills, buying new weapons and fighting different types of robots.

name: Elastrix
summary: Elastrix is a physics-based puzzle game. Place bouncy bands to guide the Trix through 60 levels, and help them to their goal of being the greatest circus attraction the world has ever seen!

name: Elemental Land
summary: Elemental Land is a free-to-play MMORPG where you can explore the world however you want, facing monsters and players. Monsters, Spells, Craft, PvE, PvP, Guilds and many more.

name: Electronic Market Simulator
summary: Electronic Market Simulator is a detailed simulation game where players manage and operate their own electronics store. Players sell products, boost customer satisfaction, and aim to become the top store. Strategic decisions in store management, customer service, and finances are required.

name: ElvenEscape
summary: Help Ann Varissa escape captivity from the demon in this stylized pixel 2D top-down shooting! Remember to keep a safe distance while killing demons with a variety of bows and weapons. Suffer the consequences of defeat with BDSM H-scenes and detailed CGs!

name: Elf Bowling Holiday Pack
summary:
Elf Bowling Holiday Bundle Game. The elves have a present for you! No, it's not a bag of smelly socks...it's two games, in one! Not only do you get to follow their wild escapades in Elf Bowling The Last Insult, but you can also join them on a tropical trip in Elf Bowling Hawaiian Vacation!

Either way, you'll compete in a variety of bowling games where the elves are the pins and there's no shortage of insults and colorful commentary! So, start the season off right with the Elf Bowling Holiday Bundle! It's wacky, elfish, festive fun!

name: Elisa: Seduce the Innkeeper
summary: The player doesn't impersonate a simple man, but a powerful, rich and famous nobleman who seems to be able to obtain whatever he wishes for. But will this be enough this time?

name: Elusive World
summary: Survive against wild animals, common bandits, and overpowering rulers. Collect ingredients to craft from simple arrows for your bow to complex Ice Sword. Rich coming-of-age adventure. Single-player, story-driven RPG.

name: Electrodash
summary: Electrodash is a die & retry where you play as a cube that must reach the finish line by bouncing off walls strewn with obstacles.

name: Elvandia Story
summary: The story revolves around Ashley, son of a Lord from the State of Kastol, who recently returned to his home town. While he is with his friends, he receives a message that the neighbouring State of Lumen is under attack from the north by the troops of Genes. He decides to stop Genes and starts his journey to Lumen in order to end the fight and restore peace on the continent.

name: Elon Tycoon
summary: Elon Tycoon is the best economic strategy game to become the greatest industrial magnate💰 Go from a self-employment in the garage to the industry leader in the world💰 Manage, build and dominate - start your empire today💰💰💰

name: Elementalist.io
summary: Action RPG Pixel Art The main character is an elementalist wizard who can use 4 elements.

name: Elderine: Dreams to Destiny
summary: A story-driven role-playing game. Rescue people, build a base, farm, craft, explore. Action Battle System, classic rpg

name: Elves: The Enchanted Magic Heart
summary: In a magical forest where every creature and plant is connected by an ancient power called the Heart of the Forest, life begins to fall apart.

name: Elitserien 95
summary: A hockey game released in Sweden in late 1994. The gameplay is based on the NHL games but it's starring the teams and players from the swedish hockey league Elitserien.

name: Eletar Hero
summary: Eletar Hero is a 2D platformer where you use the ability you have acquired from an ancient alien race to traverse through different maze-like levels, defeat many bosses and collect the other abilities the ancient Eletar left behind; all to stop a madman from taking over the world.

name: El
summary:
After waking up in a forgotten prison, he flies off in search of a purpose.

A beautiful and melancholic mobile game in which a character represented by a black silhouette embarks on a journey flying through the skies with his umbrella. With the help of feathers that will give you power over the winds, you will advance avoiding obstacles through the different screens, discovering the most fantastic little things in a world full of hostility.

name: Elitserien 96
summary: A hockey game released in Sweden in late 1995. The gameplay is based on the NHL games but it's starring the teams and players from the swedish hockey league Elitserien.

name: Elemental Seasons
summary: An exploration and survival game where players must fight elemental-themed monsters in order to escape this beautiful yet brutal world.

name: Elf: The Movie
summary:
You might say that Buddy stands out a bit at the North Pole. Sure, he was raised by elves after stowing away in Santa's bag, but after 30 years, he just doesn't seem to fit in any more – literally. Santa suggests that Buddy journey to New York and find his real father, but when he arrives, hilarity ensues as Buddy learns his way in the Big City. Make your way through 10 different stages inspired by the movie or compete in three different mini-games.

Can you take on the role of Buddy the elf and bring Christmas cheer to everyone? A six-foot, five-inch elf doesn't exactly blend in. You'll have to brave icebergs, Manhattan traffic and worse. It's up to you to help Santa and save Christmas!

name: Elevator Action EX
summary: Elevator Action EX is an update to the Game Boy version of Elevator Action published by Taito in 1991. In addition to colour, players can choose between three characters: Mike, Guy and Sarah.

name: Elara
summary: Learn how to code, solve puzzles, explore one of Jupiter's moons, and save your friend!

name: Eleonor's Nightmares
summary: A fractured family, a lonely little girl, a mystery beyond the walls of dreams... Something is happening, and it doesn't seem to be good. Explore Molly Eleonor's nightmares, find the truth and, more importantly, do not die. Enjoy this new and scary adventure, you won't sleep again.

name: Elevator Panic
summary: The eleventh and final game to be officially released for the Epoch Cassette Vision. It is labelled 12 because game 10 (Grand Champion) was cancelled.

name: Elves of Duty
summary: A fast-paced couch party game for 1-4 players. Compete to deliver the most gifts in a range of dicey arenas. Take advantage of ridiculous power-ups as you blaze your way to first place and test the limits of your friendships.

name: Eldorado Gate Volume 6
summary:
El Dorado Gate is console gaming's first serial RPG series, where each Dreamcast GD-ROM contains 3 seperate (though interrelated) adventures, each telling a story of one of the series' 12 characters. There's 7 volumes in all, the first few introducing the characters whilst the later volumes flesh out how their stories are related, leading to the finale.

Part of Capcom's experiment of serializing an RPG over a year with one part every other month.

name: Elementium
summary: Elementium is a puzzle mind game. Manage the world of illusions and solve puzzles based on illusions and physics. Unique game mechanics for manipulation are available to you, starting with ordinary objects and ending with physical laws. Whether it's an ordinary cube or a planet, now everything is in your hands!

name: Elodya
summary: Explore, craft, fight! Uncover the mysteries of the continent of Elodya by meeting interesting characters, completing quests, upgrading your gear and defeating tough bosses!

name: Electrician Simulator: First Shock
summary: Learn the ropes from your Dad to become an electrician. Repair and assemble sockets, panels, strips, plugs, chandeliers and even change light bulbs. Oh... and don't mix up the wires! Results might be shocking.

name: Elohim Eternal: The Babel Code
summary: Explore a vibrant world where ancient religions fuse with technology in this character-driven JRPG. Master deep turn-based combat as you battle with divine magic against beasts with mecha parts. Embark on a grand adventure to retrieve the sacred Babel code needed to face your Gods.

name: Elegos
summary: Want to overthrow the sovereignty or work to stand with them? Decide for yourself in Elegos, an immersive first-person RPG where every action matters. Designed with a flexible play system, forge a path through a world where complex political forces clash in any way you like.

name: Electronic Popple
summary: A beat 'em up that features anthropomorphic computer components.

name: Eluxia Enigma
summary: Eluxia Enigma is a platformer exploration game where you arrive on the planet of Eluxia, a planet riddled with gravitational anomalies. Master the gravity in this platformer with a twisted perspective!

name: Elette Fragments
summary: Join Benviolo, the axe wielding star of the play, and his comrades Mathias Jr and Juliet in this unique beat em up style game. Solve the mystery surrounding the island nation of Lotte in the years that follow the zombie invasion and the return of Queen Hermielle!

name: ElectroMaster
summary: A game where you control an anime girl who is charged with electricity when you hold the screen and then kills enemies by releasing it.

name: Electronic Billiards
summary: Billiards game for the Odyssey 2. Includes 8 Ball and Rotation modes.

name: Elementalist
summary: In this movement puzzle platformer, you have to collect your abilities before using them. Jump, dash, dive, and teleport inside carefully crafted levels, to salvage as many sun fragments as possible.

name: Elong Plug
summary: Play as an elastic plug trying to become as long as LORD ELON. Use your climbing, dangling, and stretching skills to collect coins and buy length upgrades. Will LORD ELON accept you?

name: Eliminator
summary:
Eliminator puts you in control of experimental hovering craft, running the gauntlet of various courses, dodging obstacles and blowing up opponents in an attempt to reach the end before an on-board bomb blows you up and out the game.

As you progress through the game you gain the standard options of upgrades and the courses become trickier to navigate.

name: Elite Dangerous: Commander Premium Edition
summary: Take control of your own starship in a cutthroat galaxy. Elite Dangerous is the definitive massively multiplayer space epic. Includes Elite Dangerous: Odyssey, and the Elite Dangerous: Odyssey OST.

name: Elemental Force
summary: Role-playing game developed by Class Corporation for Macintosh computers.

name: Elon's Dream
summary: In your hands is given control of a would-be astronaut who is looking for a way to get out of the ill-fated red planet. Use your jetpack to jump from platform to platform, and not to forget that the jetpack's fuel reserves are limited, so be careful and economical during the flight!

name: Elegy for Them Vigil
summary: A sequel to the previous map Ode of Resurrection, Elegy is a nonlinear "tech base being turned into an outpost of hell"-themed map.

name: Elements of Destruction
summary: The DS port of Elements of Destruction

name: Elf Defense
summary: Players can place characters, sell characters, set up automatic skill release, skill synthesis and more by clicking the mouse. The game provides an intuitive and easy to understand interface and operations, so that players can easily play the game.

name: Elevator VR
summary: Experience the journey of riding an elevator.

name: Elmo's World: Elmo's Big Discoveries
summary: Learn preschool skills with Elmo and Mr. Noodle.

name: Element TD 2: Mazing Expansion
summary: Mazing brings the ability to obstruct the enemies' path directly. This forces enemies to change their route based on what you do. A multitude of different enemy paths possible provides tons of new strategies for your towers.

name: Elven Warmaiden
summary: An fantasy Auto-battler game in which you command the elven Warmaidens to fend off waves and waves of attack from enemies besieging your capital city

name: Elements of War
summary: Elements of War is a modern RTS developed by Lesta Studio

name: Elkabo: Selina's Dark Spirit
summary: When your sister stumbled upon a dark secret you start on a quest of rescue that could just rewrite history.

name: Elland: The Crystal Wars
summary: After 20 years, experience the never-before-released Game Boy Advance game Elland: The Crystal Wars. As an ace raptor pilot, protect the Gatherers as they harvest the precious Crystal from the remote desert world of Elland from the vicious forces of the Trafford Corporation.

name: El-Drifto
summary: The game aims is to drive, and drift your car in the city. You can also jumps on the wall and to do flips. Earn money by drifting and doing flips without flipping the car on the roof. Level up and buy new wheels, turbo and cars with your money and customize your car colour for your own pleasure.

name: Elvera
summary: Welcome into the realm of ELVERA, an Indie Third-Person PvP Action Game passionately developed by a single developer.

name: Elmo's World and You
summary: Based on Sesame Street’s most popular mini-series of all time, this is a collection of interactive Sesame Street “appisodes,” which will help teach your child about the world around them through creativity and play.

name: Eli
summary: A small Bullet hell about shooting demons.

name: El Shaddai: Ascension of the Metatron
summary: El Shaddai: Ascension of the Metatron, originally released in 2011, is a unique third-person action adventure filled with a deeply artistic world-building, outstanding aesthetics and thrilling battles.

name: Elevator Madness
summary: Elevator Madness is a side scroller game with elevator control, where the player controls the direction of movement and helps employees get into the right doors, but over time, there are more and more employees, and less and less time!

name: Elements Voice Series vol.2 Rika Fukami - Private Step
summary: Elements Voice Series vol.2: Rica Fukami - Private Step (エレメントボイスシリーズ(2) 深見 梨加 〜Private Step〜) is a CD-ROM-based title for the Playdia console, featuring full motion video of Japanese pop idol Rica Fukami (深見 梨加).

name: Eleanor 3
summary: Dating sim where you need to make various choices and perform actions based on a daily schedule in order to put her life on the right track. In this story, you'll meet characters from the previous parts as well as new ones. 1000 static images and over 80 animations (30 frames each).

name: Elve
summary: Single player horror battle royal shooter

name: Elven War RPG
summary: Unleash your magic and join the fight against darkness in Elven War RPG! Help the women elves save their forest from corruption in this thrilling memory-RPG. With a captivating storyline and immersive gameplay, it's an adventure you won't forget!

name: Electric Sheep: A Cyberpunk Dystopia
summary: In the near future, humanity has been minimalized, as the rise of android-rule crushes any threats to its near-term dominance. As part of the resistance, it’s your goal to undermine the automated dictatorship, and help free mankind from its robotic bonds.

name: Elite Forces: WWII - Iwo Jima
summary: Join the ranks of the U.S. marines as you embark on a treacherous and chaotic amphibious beach landing, defeat a vast network of interconnected pillboxes and emplaced guns, negotiate your way through perilous mine fields and enemy bunkers to track down and eliminate an elusive enemy. Experience the story of one rifleman’s heroic struggle to survive and prevail among the nearly 100,000 combatants who warred for 36 days for possession of the island of Iwo Jima.

name: Elite Forces: Navy SEALs - Weapons of Mass Destruction
summary: Wage a silent, deadly war on terrorism. Your SEAL team has its lethal counter-terrorism objectives. Secretly penetrate international hot spots from the sea, air and land to carry out your assigned missions. Survive dangerous operations using your combat training and stealth to neutralize this threat forever.

name: Elemental Dreams
summary: In this game, you play as Yousotsuki, a 14-year-old boy who loves nature. But one day, a series of natural disasters struck, causing him to lose his entire family, with only him surviving. Since then, he has begun to question whether nature really loves him or not. He then decided to go to an uninhabited place and stayed there for who knows how long to find peace and quiet and be closer to nature. He had nothing to do but sleep and explore dream worlds of elements.

name: Elette
summary: After the events of the Reaper Wars, Lotte had become a shattered nation. Under the rule of Mathias, the citizens managed to rebuild some of their once proud nation. After years of reconstruction, the island nation of Lotte is soon threatened by a darker, more vile threat; one that had been sleeping since the Reaper Wars. Take control of Mathias as he fights for his life against the invading horde in this haunted tower defense game!

name: Elder Chaos
summary: Elder Chaos is a strategy game based on Lovecraft’s Cthulhu mythos. You are no longer investigators but the eldritch Old Ones in Elder Chaos. Now, it's time to break the seal and reign over the world!

name: Elite Escape
summary: You've been accepted to Alpha-X, an elite special forces unit comprised of only the brightest analytical minds in the world. Pass the entry test and show that your selection was not a mistake. Test your problem-solving skills in this futuristic puzzle/escape room game!

name: Elasticritters!
summary: Elasticritters!, the dynamic, fast-paced precision platformer filled with daring jumps and wild stunts. Hone your skills and see if you have what it takes to master this exhilarating bouncy adventure!

name: Elimora
summary: Master Elemental Creatures in real-time deck-building adventure! Explore a fantasy world filled with magical creatures. Collect spirit fragments to summon and evolve companions, use cards to unleash powerful abilities, and uncover the secrets of the mystical realm to prevent its destruction.

name: Elevenses
summary: A visual novel game that claims to be a mystery/romance genre.

name: Eleventh: Unsacred
summary: the last of the last eleven: the director, another seven

name: Elf Breeding Farm
summary: Centuries of mastering ancient magics and unbeatable fighting techniques, all undone by dirty thoughts and lewd fantasies! Take these sexy elves down a peg as they quiver in awe of your indomitable human "spirit"!

name: Elite Dangerous: Commander Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Elite Dangerous: Commander Deluxe Edition is a bundle that includes Elite Dangerous: Arena, Elite: Dangerous, Elite Dangerous: Horizons, the Elite Dangerous Core and the Commander Pack. 
 
The Elite Dangerous: Commander Pack contains a selection of 18 paint jobs for you to begin customizing the appearance of your ship in Elite Dangerous. 
 
Items included in the pack are as follows: i. Sidewinder Vibrant Paint Pack ii. Viper Impression Paint Pack iii. Cobra MkIII Military Paint Pack

name: Elemental Gelade: Tozasareshi Uta
summary:
Elemental Gelade: Tozasareshi Uta is a RPG based on the manga/anime Elemental Gelade. The story takes place in the world of Guardia where beings called Edel Raids coexist with humans, and can fuse with them by becoming a powerful weapon.

The player controls five characters from the anime: Coud Van Giruet, Reverie ‘Ren’ Metherlence (the most powerful Edel Raid, fuses with Coud), Cisqua, Rowen and Kuea (another Edel Raid, fuses with Rowen).

The team journeys from town to town and fights enemies and meets new original characters throughout an original story. In the turn-based battles, the player gives commands such as fight, fuse and help to the party members.

name: Element Runner
summary: Across land, water and clouds! Element Runner is a fun, casual platformer where you can explore worlds filled with grass, water, fire, candy and electricity! Featuring over 8 worlds and 60 levels, this game is a relaxing, completionists dream. Your journey in Element Runner awaits!

name: Electro Freddy
summary:
The action takes place inside the warehouse owned by Uncle Claude of “Sincrum Research". You are Freddy, a young employee of Uncle Claude. There is a rumour spreading around, among the workers, that Uncle Claude is secretly going to increase the prices of his products which might meana the loss of jobs. A vote was taken and it was decided that you must stop Claude by packing away all the products and shipping them off to the shops. You enter the warehouse in the dead of night to start your task but look, there’s Claude!!!

You must push the products onto the conveyor belt. If Claude catches you you are kicked out of the door where an ambulance will rush you to hospital. You have 3 chances to save your fellow workers from redundancy but an extra chance will be awarded at 5000 points. You must avoid the deadly spectrims that Claude throws at you when he gets angry. Also Claude has hired the services of Satsuma Inc, who
throw oracs from the roof - you’d better watch out for those too!!! You can make your task easier by knocking Claude off his feet. You do this by pushing one of the products onto him, from above or below (not from the sides).

name: Ells Tales: Egg
summary: Welcome to the survival horror clicker! Try to save a chicken egg and at the same time your life.

name: Elephantasy: Flipside
summary: Use and upgrade magic items, collect hidden treasures, and uncover the secrets between two worlds in this cute isometric puzzler! When a certain vacationing Elephant stumbles upon a way into the land of the dead, will she unwittingly let something far more sinister slip through?

name: Elo 1100 Chess
summary: Play from beginners level to top level ELO 1100 (very good level, if you beat your device here, respect!) in this high quality Chess Game Engine.

name: EllrLand
summary: EllrLand is a new generation of adventure card games. With randomly generated levels, nearly a hundred powerful cards, artifacts for your use, and three unique pets to play with you.

name: El Sorrado Speedway
summary: El Sorrado Speedway is a level mod for Quadrilateral Cowboy.

name: Elminage Gothic 3D Remix: Ulm Zakir to Yami no Gishiki
Elemental Pinball
summary: Elemental pinball is a flipper game on Playstation. You need to use natural elements for not lost your ball and make many points.

name: Elemental Abyss
summary: “This is my attacking route!” This is a turn-based strategy game that includes Roguelike and card elements.

name: Elon Must: Road to Respect
summary: Help Elon Must make his way from Earth to Mars to pay respects to the deceased robot Opportunity.

name: Ellen Whitaker's Horse Life
summary:
In Horse Life 2 the player can select his horse from seven different breeds and can take care of it, train it and take part in various competitions.

The horse's behaviour is thereby depicted in a lifelike way in real-time. All competitions in the riding world such as dressage, show jumping and cross country are shown realistically. A gripping story really at-tracts the player to the screen and allows him to experience many differing tasks in a wide range of varied locations.

name: Element
summary: Element is a realtime strategy space game for people who don't have time to play realtime strategy space games. Generate energy, mine element, build attack and defence units, and destroy the enemy while maintaining a balance between earth, air and water.

name: Elementalist: 0
summary: 2D fantasy action brawler

name: Elemental World Part 1: Rise of the Guardians
summary: Elemental World is an urban fantasy community focused evolving MMO that aims to give full freedom to be who you want and earn your fame and fortune. You must learn self reliance and establish your place in the world whether you're a collector, risk taker, villain, or spy. The difference is that you've chosen who you are, how you want to behave and what you want to be.

name: Ellie
summary: Ellie is an ordinary urban girl who is keen on shooting, but has never held a real weapon in her hands until this moment ... Now this girl is fighting for her family and her city, - killing evil spirits, which is happy to eat the parts of her body.

name: Eloriasha
summary: Inspired by the classics, Eloriasha is a simple yet challenging action-platformer about a man who's trying to save the world.

name: Elminage DS Remix: Yami no Miko to Kamigami no Yubiwa
Elestrals
summary:
A game of monsters, magic, and mythology! You have been chosen as a champion of the Gods, blessed with the ability to bond with the mythical Elestrals.

Together with your companions, learn to cast powerful spells using elemental spirits in your fight for the honor of the Pantheon! As a chosen moral, you'll need to be both courageous and cunning to claim victory and attain immortality.

name: Elden Bling
summary: After overdosing on fentanyl, Tyrone is granted a second chance at life. Seek the Elden Bling, powerful artifacts once belonging to the Pharaohs themselves, and rewrite your destiny...

name: Eldrum: Black Dust
summary: Dive into a dark, immersive world where your choices shape your destiny. Eldrum: Black Dust is a gripping text-based RPG that combines the depth of D&D, the strategic gameplay of CRPGs, and the narrative freedom of CYOA gamebooks.

name: Elena's Journal: To Atlantis
summary: Discover the lost secrets of Atlantis in this Time Management Adventure!

name: Element Are We
summary: "ElementAreWe" is an innovative, educational rogue-like deck builder. Explore the periodic table's wonders, engage in card-based battles, and learn while having fun! Perfect for all ages.

name: ElectricVLab
summary: ElectricVLab employs the technology of video games to explore the fascinating world of electricity and electronics. It allows you to build a wide variety of analog and digital electronic circuits, and observe their behavior in a visually rich, informative, fun environment.

name: Elash
summary: You've been hired to defend Elash, the kingdom that you don't have any relation with. The money that the King promised you was more than enough to drive you defending it from Ashley's minions.

name: Electronic Football
summary:
JUST LIKE THE ORIGINAL - Feel nostalgic and retro while playing the most fun football handheld game of all time!

CLASSIC GAMEPLAY - Run, kick and move forward or sideways to avoid tacklers while playing by yourself or against someone else!

SHARE - Perfect for fans or collectors looking to share this classic with the new generation!

name: Elf Bowling 7 1/7: The Last Insult
summary: Elf Bowling 7 1/7: The Last Insult is something of an update to Super Elf Bowling. Again, the elves are on strike so, they are bowling pins. In this newest version, however, you can pick up items that can be dirty tricks or bonuses. Dirty tricks are things like making you opponents ball half size, and less effective, or making the ball go out of control. Bonus items are things like speed boost or removing the gutters. The scoring is, otherwise, standard bowling scoring. Play goes to ten frames with the highest score winning.

name: Eldritch Exterminators
summary: Face the Eldritch hordes. You are a possessed gun, feeding on the souls of the dead. Grow your power and challenge the Eldritch Gods for Dominion over the Void. Slay the Forgotten Ones and harness Unspeakables in this Bullet Heaven, and escape the ties that bind.

name: Elves vs. Goblins Mahjongg World
summary: Darkness descends upon the land of elves and goblins. Black clouds of smoke rise from the deep fiery maw of the volcano at Sparkle Mountain. They spread and with them gloom and cruel curses ...

name: Elven Love
summary: Elven Love will let you feel ancient magic on your own skin! Immerse into mystical and mysterious worlds of Wood and Moon Elves..

name: Electrolight
summary: Electrolight is a tiny game about a tiny piece of light on a tiny adventure. The goal— explore the world outside the cozy home you wake up in everyday—the computer.

name: Elemental Survivors: Roguelike
summary: Fight off hordes of enemies, slay Bosses, choose from a variety of upgrades and combine your spells to create unique and game-breaking builds In this auto-attacking roguelite.

name: El Chat Escolar
summary: Various friends are talking in the school chatroom about the story of "Los Santos", a student found dead at school long time ago. Rumors say that if you enter in a certain chatroom, his spirit would appear to kill you. Before long, the chat users start noticing that things are turning strange...

name: Elithian Races Mod
summary: Elithian Races Mod is a substantial expansion designed for Starbound, introducing four fresh playable races alongside an extensive array of hundreds of new items, objects, weaponry, armor components, and numerous other enhancements. Two additional outposts have been incorporated, brimming with fresh quests and various merchants for players to engage with.

name: El Capitán Trueno en la Montaña de los Suspiros
Elysium
summary:
In "Elysium", you rule one of these independent provinces. Your goal is threefold: (1) survive politically until the fall of the Western Roman Empire in 476 A.D.; (2) make your country the most livable for your people, turning it into an "Elysium", an island of the blessed in those turbulent times; (3) (optionally) build an empire of your own by conquering other provinces.

Your challenges are firstly foreign and secondly domestic: ward off pillaging barbarian tribes such as the Vandals or the Huns and defend against legions of Roman troops sent by the Emperor to forcibly reintegrate you into his failing Empire. This requires building, equipping and maintaining a whole army of militia, career soldiers and mercenaries, financed by a vibrant domestic economy. Thus your tasks at home include the production of agricultural and other goods and building the necessary infrastructure, trade by sea and land, law enforcement and taxation, and most importantly: stay in power by keeping the masses happy with "bread and circuses".

Groups +

name: Elif
summary: Elif is a 3rd person puzzle-platformer. You will experience a wholesome narration following the main character Elif. You will have to face challenges and succeed in all trials. But you won't be alone: your favorite friend and companion Crocus will be there to help you!

name: El Shaddai for Android Vol. 1
summary: The first of a series of episodic content downloads. El Shaddai for Android is a side-scrolling game in the world of El Shaddai.

name: Elephant Hunter Hunter
summary: Stop hunters hunting elephants!

name: Eldabyss
summary: A fast-paced, bloody, gothic, and stylish platformer video game about saving the mortal realm from the wrath of Hell's armies.

name: Elixir of Life
summary: Fight, loot, craft equipment, collect your heroes and defeat evil! While doing all these, grow crops on your farm, feed your animals, make friends with the towns people, cook food, discover mysteries!

name: El Dorado
summary:
It is a strategic defense game depicting the adventures of Ace friends in search of the golden castle, El Dorado.
Find the lost golden city of El Dorado through exciting battles with users around the world!

name: Elves in Paradise: Elf Bowling 2
summary: The sequel to Elf Bowling.

name: Eldritchvania
summary: Explore unearthly ruins, solve arcane riddles and pick up your sword against the indescribable horrors that lurk amidst the forgotten depths of our world. Beware the creeping grip of madness as you uncover secrets not meant for the eyes of men!

name: Elepong
summary: Taito's attempt at the arcade ping-pong game genre, and likely their first ever arcade game release. It uses imported Pong PC Boards in a Taito-produced cabinet.

name: Elaria: The Corrupted Throne
summary: In Elaria you journey through an open world filled with monsters, allies, and dungeons. Slay, loot, play cards, dungeon dive, and unravel the storied mysteries of a falling kingdom in this epic tale of action and adventure!

name: Elrit Clover: A Forest in the Rut is Full of Dangers
summary: 2.5D puzzle action. You can customize a heroine, and aim for Imperial Knights' Garrison to seek help. If the heroine is got by bad guys, she got sexual play.

name: Electron Zaraftor
summary: Sam is an artificial intelligence drone, programmed by Rebecca, designed and built by the US army. Connected to the army database, Sam start asking questions from the archive. And accessed the wrong file.

name: Elite Comet
summary: Elite Comet is a collision-based fighting game that revolves around strategic clashes and precise collisions. Master the art of combat as every collision shapes the intensity of the battles, offering a uniquely dynamic and thrilling gaming experience.

name: Eliss
summary:
Eliss is a puzzle video game developed and published by Steph Thirion. It was released for the iPhone OS on March 6, 2009. 
Eliss' gameplay revolves around filling "squeesars" with planets of like color and size. Planets can be combined, split, and moved around using the multi-touch interface. Further complication is added by passing red stars and vortices.

name: Electro Man
summary: Electro Man seeks revenge against the robots which wronged him.

name: Elementals Reborn
summary:
In Elementals Reborn you will explore the forgotten lands and fight their inhabitants. 
Increase your rate by fighting in different modes, alone or with allies. In Elementals Reborn, you can find entertainment of your own!

name: Elusive Verge
summary:
Elusive Verge is a third-person sci-fi exploration game set on a Comet on its way around the Earth. You take control over a drone, one of the two survivors of an attack on your expedition party. Alongside the other survivor, Artificial Intelligence residing inside a space station, you have no other choice than to find out who tried to destroy you, what was their motivation and how to stop them. You face your enemies head-on, in a fast and spectacular space combat. The enemy is dangerous and violent but thankfully, you have a range of various weapons and combat gadgets at your disposal. As a true survivor, you craft your own tools and to do so, you need resources. With the possibility of digging into the vast extent of destructible terrain, Elusive Verge lets you unleash your inner miner. And who knows, maybe you will find something more than ore? On top of that, you should never forget about your space-station. Not only it allows you to upgrade and research equipment, it is also an essential piece to overcoming your foe. Without it, you wouldn’t stand a chance.

Fight off the enemy hordes, protect and improve your station, and literally dig into the secret of the Comet.

name: Elevator Action: Death Parade
summary: Elevator Action: Death Parade is a light-gun shooter with an Elevator Action license.

name: Elise
summary: Awakened in a bunker amidst a zombie outbreak after a car crash, guide Elise through harrowing challenges, solve puzzles, and face relentless undead hordes and uncovering the bunker's dark secrets

name: Eldrum: Untold
summary: Eldrum: Untold (Previously Untold RPG) is an immersive text-based RPG adventure, combining old school Choose Your Own Adventure features with modern twists.

name: Electro-Dynamic Mayhem
summary: Join the not-so-goody two-shoes robot 'EDM' in a Wario Land 4-inspired speedy‎ platformer where your goal is to cause as much destruction to public property as you can while doing field research.‎

name: Elixir
summary: Elixir is seeking an experienced lead sorceress's apprentice. You’ll join our team located somewhere in the nether world to feed, wash, and document mysterious creatures (applicants inexperienced with dragon vomit need not apply). The apprentice will also maintain various delicate contraptions while experimenting in an unstable alchemy lab. Constant praise of the sorceress's brilliance is expected.

name: Elon's Last Chance
summary: Elon's Last Chance is a time management simulator with a running astronaut under your control. Complete tasks that appear gradually within the timer. Try to hold out as long as possible, because if any of the timers expires, the game will be over.

name: Electioneering
summary: You are at the nexus of the events of 2020; you will hire agents, run political ads, research topics, use hacking, and more in this turn-based political strategy game. In Electioneering, your goal is to ensure your candidate becomes the next President of the United States.

name: Eliminator
summary: A fast based vertical scrolling shooter written by John Phillips, the man behind Nebulus (also known as Tower Toppler).

name: Electric Sleep
summary: Electric Sleep is a pixel art visual novel. Explore a crumbling world as an emotionally driven robot.

name: E-Lich: Corporate Souls
summary: There’s no R.I.P at E-Lich Corp! Explore the afterlife in this roguelite bullet heaven that is all about humor, insane power-levels, replayability and awful office jokes. Reap souls along your undead coworkers in a company that values your life. And death. Literally.

name: ELOA: Elite Lord of Alliance
summary: ELOA is an anime-inspired triple action hack and slash MMORPG, with familiar Action RPG controls and an isometric view on your character. Players can choose between one of 5 playable classes among 4 races, with each class having access to 3 combat stances. ELOAs unique gameplay revolves around tactically switching between the three stances mid-combat, while each stance offers a different playstyle and purpose. ELOA is set in a vibrant, open world full of PvP battles, quests & dungeon raids. It comes with and instance party finder system and features an extensive pet & costume system to suit all players.

name: Elephant Quest
summary: The fight is on! Wooly has taken your precious bowler cap and now you are on a romp to go get it back! Explore the freeform world of 45 various areas in this RPG-Shooter hybrid. Complete sidequests to get power-ups, extra firepower, and experience! Navigate the ridiculous Level Up tree to become the most powerful elephant in the universe.

name: Ellie's
summary: Ellie's is a more traditional fan game with elements of old and new while still being different. ELLIE'S was also built on the formula which permeated FNAF 1 through Sister Location. Investigate Ellie's, gather evidence of the past and the paranormal, and show your findings

name: El Monstruo de los Globos
summary: Unlicensed game released only in Spain.

name: Elisa: The Innkeeper - Prequel
summary: This short Visual novel can be considered as a little introductory episode of the game Elisa the innkeeper. Enjoy our Art and Soundtrack as you begin to shape Elisa's destiny for the better or the worse!

name: Ellia
summary:
"ELLIA" is a premium rhythm game that weaves captivating stories into its gameplay.

Experience breathtaking visuals and superb UI/UX, complemented by a carefully curated soundtrack of original music from Arcstar. Dive into the rhythm and play today!

name: Electric Alps
summary: You are an electrician, moving back to your hometown in the Austrian Alps, which you find lacks a certain... spark. Promptly tasked with wiring up the village, you solve electrical puzzles, blow fuses and master real-world circuitry techniques. Electrify the Alps, one circuit at a time.

name: Elementals Beta
summary: Elementals Beta is a multiplayer roleplay game where you harness the elements of the universe to defeat fearsome enemies and friends.

name: Elfengard Hunter Slayer
summary: Welcome to the world of Elfengard. You will follow the journey to discover how the hero ended up in this fantasy world full of monsters.

name: Elden Ring GB
summary: What if Elden Ring released in 1993? Elden Ring GB is a demake of Elden Ring that runs on real retro hardware including all Game Boy consoles, as well as in emulators and on Analogue Pocket. You can also play it right here in your browser, though the other methods are recommended to allow for saving, better colours and higher accuracy. Explore all of the Precipice of Anticipation, Northern Limgrave and Stormveil Castle in this bite-sized demake experience made in GB Studio.

name: Electro Air Hockey: Under the Mallet
Elastic Soccer
summary: Elastic Soccer is a classic soccer-themed flash game with a twist. In this game, the players cannot move except for the goal keeper. The ball on the hand, gets attracted to the nearest player. Players must then shoot the ball like a rubber band and try to get a good angle for a shot. Take control of the goal keeper by pressing and holding down the Shift Key. The goal of the game is to outscore your opponent before the match is over.

name: El Engaño de Barbapoca: Capítulo 1 - Esta Pizza Está de Muerte
Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree - Collector's Edition
summary: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree - Collector's Edition includes the Elden Ring - Shadow of the Erdtree expansion code, a 46cm statue of "Messmer the Impaler", one of the key boss characters in Shadow of the Erdtree, an art book, and a download voucher for the original soundtrack.

name: Elementico
summary: 2D Jump and Run with puzzle elements

name: Elfaria
summary: Elfaria is a Role-Playing game, developed by RED Entertainment and published by Hudson, which was released in Japan in 1993.

name: Elevenses: The Flask
summary: A mystery romance visual novel about newly married couple Jiwon and Somang who one day meet the devil, "Mephie".

name: Elite Beat Zombygons
summary: Slaying zombies never sounded so good!

name: Eliminator
summary:
This 1981 vector graphics arcade game is available in both two- and four-player configurations.

A top-down space shooter set within a bounded playfield, where the player maneuvers a ship using rotation, thrust and forward-firing controls (much like Asteroids or Space War). Each stage is populated by autmated drone ships (or by competing players), and dominated by the titular enemy: a moving, rotating space fortress surrounded by a lethal force field.

name: Electroplankton Hanenbow
summary: Normally aquatic creatures, Hanenbow sometimes use floating leaves to launch themselves out of the water, creating strange sounds and melodies as they bounce off the leaves.

name: Elfblade
summary: A forsaken rogue must find freedom through retrieving seven legendary stones. Explore a hostile land, with deadly underground passages, unforgiving forests, caves full of gold and more. Use potions, bombs and arrows to fight dozens of enemies, seek hidden dungeons and defeat powerful bosses.

name: Elementum
summary: Elementum is a challenging roguelike dungeon crawler with elemental spells and bullet hell elements. Fight in multiple rooms defeating a wide range of enemy encounters, and by doing so, discover multiple spells and augments to craft your own build and playstyle!

name: Element Hunters
summary: A DS game based on the anime series of the same name.

name: Eleven Eleven
summary: Their fate has been decided, but how you watch is up to you. Eleven Eleven is a groundbreaking entertainment experience that puts you in the center of the story. Follow six main characters as they count down the last 11 minutes and 11 seconds of life on the island planet of Kairos Linea.

name: Elite of Conquerors
summary: An independent MMORPG, created by the company "EC Games Studio," Elite of Conquerors is a multiplayer adventure game set in a fantastical world.

name: Elitserien 2001
summary: "Elitserien 2001" is an expansion pack for the EA Sports game NHL 2001. It includes the Swedish Elitserien and the Finnish SM-liiga, the top hockey leagues in Sweden and Finland. The cover features Henrik Zetterberg, a player from Timrå (and later the Detroit Red Wings) in Sweden.

name: Elf Kicker: Level Pack (10 Levels)
summary: 10 more levels of Elf Kicker featuring a new enemy and new obstacles.

name: Elden Ring: Ascended
summary:
With three different available difficulties, Elden Ring Ascended adds plenty of changes to the base game:

-Enemies' physics and AI changed
-New armour set effects on each piece
-New Talismans' effects
-New weapons' effects
-New enemies' status debuffs
-Altering armours gives different effects
-Spells', Items', and Weapon Arts' buffs stack
-Changeable Weapon Arts on each weapon

name: Election Tycoon: Trump vs. Harris
summary: Step into the intense world of U.S. politics with Election Tycoon! In this real-time strategy game, you'll take on the role of a presidential candidate in the 2024 elections. Whether you choose to be Donald Trump, Kamala Harris, or create your own independent candidate, your goal is to sway the nation and secure your place in the White House.

name: Elevator Action
summary: A port of the arcade game of the same name, made by Sega for their SG-1000 console. Due to the system's limitations, the scrolling is more choppy and the game has less detailed graphics.

name: Elder Gods Simulator
summary: It is a roguelike+ simulation business game, you will play a Elder Gods attract diviners, mental patients, judges, bounty hunters, witches, princesses and other people become believers, defeat other extraordinary creatures and evil gods, recover their own strength. Note: Believers may marry.

name: Elden Ring Reforged
summary: ELDEN RING Reforged (ERR) is a mod by Kirnifr and ivi, with assistance from Poeconcept, Hanalove and Cavou. ERR is a thorough revision of ELDEN RING's balance and mechanics. The mod covers enemies, boss fights, hitboxes, animations, equipment, the camera, and more. Main features include unique camera parameters for boss fights, improved enemy hitboxes, reworked scaling and leveling, a new Runeforging system to encourage open world exploration and make NG+ more rewarding, changed gameplay mechanics that fix many of the vanilla game's issues, new Spells and Weapons, and more!

name: El Litri en Busca del Odrogoban Perdido
summary: El Litri en Busca del Odrogoban Perdido is an hilarious RPG game made on RPG Maker by KrusheR.

name: Elfland Reloaded: Volume 2
summary: In Elfland Reloaded, you take on the role of Elfie or Elfita to try and save the elf village from threatening trolls. On your quest, you will encounter helpful turtles, aggressive birds, bouncing springs, purple elf-eaters, and other assorted creatures. In the second volume, you will meet the cloud people, Mortimer (Gorgimer's cousin), a gigantic bird, and the evil trolls. You will also get the chance to defeat the Troll Chieftain, rescue the village elves, and receive the Elf Medal of Honor!

name: Electronic Emotions!
summary: You have loved working with electronics ever since you were a young girl, and finding work at an electronics manufacturing company seemed like the natural choice. However, your sales begin to fall and you worry about the stability of your career... until your boss invites you to join a new project. The project is secretive and requires you to pack up your belongings and move to a new address. You are suspicious at first but excited at the possibility of a promotion. When you open the door to the house, you are greeted by three handsome men! At first you are distracted by their impossibly good looks, but soon realize that their actions are far from normal…

name: Eldritch Empathy
summary: Learn the language of a cosmic colossus in the Lovecraftian rogue-lite Eldritch Empathy. Study eerie horrors to learn their secrets, or destroy them and face the consequences. Your choices determine the fate of humanity.

name: Elden Ring: Collector's Edition
Elements: Path of the Wizard
summary: A card game where you will be responsible for the fate of an entire kingdom. Try on the role of a wise court magician, who is able to prevent a catastrophe with just a wave of his hand. At your disposal will be valuable magic items and all the existing elements.

name: Eldervale
summary: Eldervale is a true Third-Person Survival Horror Adventure game, made in the style of early 2000's classics. Explore a large, interconnected level, solve puzzles, uncover the story and survive the horrors by strategic use of your resources and fight or flight decisions.

name: Elements: Soul of Fire
summary: The light of the world fades. Evil hearts seek the Power of the Elements - the forces which bind the universe together - thus threatening all of existence. An homage to the 8-BIT era with a charming art style.

name: Elysion
summary:
Elysion is a traditional 8-bit JRPG that incorporates elements from various RPG games. While it starts with the player talking to the local King for exposition, similar to other traditional JRPGs, it takes inspiration from different games within the RPG genre. It shares similarities with the first Dragon Quest in appearance, offers the choice of multiple protagonists like in Final Fantasy, features real-time combat without screen transitions like Hydlide or Ys, and adopts the strategy of enemies only moving when the player does, as seen in strategic Roguelike dungeon crawlers like the Mystery Dungeon series.

The main objective of the game is to defeat the evil demon Baal. However, before facing this final challenge, the player character is tested by the King. They are tasked with entering the dungeon beneath the castle and retrieving important quest items. Once they successfully complete this extensive dungeon, the protagonist is recognized as the Hero of God and can embark on a journey to defeat Baal. This entails exploring the continent to find magical scrolls and eventually acquiring special God-like equipment.

The term "Elysion" refers to the Elysian Fields, an ancient Roman underworld reserved for honorable souls who died in battle.

name: Elbub
summary: You are a bubble, flying among other bubbles. Relax and go for a journey!

name: ElbmarKs
summary: A tribute to the magnificent side-scrolling Arcade shoot’-em-up games with a modern look, physics-based movement, and some challenging twists that will test your speed, reflexes, accuracy, patience, and memory at the same time.

name: Elemental Defenders TD
summary: A Tower Defense where the Towers are moving around the enemies. With over 200 towers and endless mode. There is almost infinite strategies.

name: Electronic Super Joy: Groove City
summary:
A sequel to Electronic Super Joy! A brave new World, ending in an Epic Boss Fight!
Jump, dodge & dance among insane hazards, missiles, lasers & monsters!Plot
A Giant Robot Stripper called JoJo has smashed Groove City! She's angry because Dr Swinger stole her Laser-Nipples!

name: Ellie: Help me out, please...
summary:
Ellie - Help me out, please… is a free mystery horror puzzle game for mobile devices that challenges you to help Ellie find a way out from the room she is trapped in.

Will you leave Ellie to her dark fate? Can you find the way out? Work together with Ellie to locate and use items that solve puzzles which will lead to her escape. You may also find the true secret that is hidden in this horror...

name: Elemental Engagements
summary: Wield god powers and command legions of elemental thralls against your friends! Elemental Engagements is a split-screen, versus, real-time-strategy game. Gain favor with the elemental gods to use their 16 powers, battle on 3 maps, and play with either Keyboard or Controller!

name: Elephants Remember
summary: An interactive music track

name: Elite Soldier Shooter
summary: Sometimes there are tasks where SWAT can not handle... and then you appear — Elite Soldier. You are the "champion" on special assignments.

name: Eldorado Gate Volume 3
summary:
El Dorado Gate is console gaming's first serial RPG series, where each Dreamcast GD-ROM contains 3 seperate (though interrelated) adventures, each telling a story of one of the series' 12 characters. There's 7 volumes in all, the first few introducing the characters whilst the later volumes flesh out how their stories are related, leading to the finale.

Part of Capcom's experiment of serializing an RPG over a year with one part every other month.

name: Elephantastic
summary: Elephantastic is a short cartoony 3D Puzzle Platformer, in which you defeat you enemies through sheer weight!

name: Elven Assassin: Rise of Darkness
summary: Step into a world shrouded in darkness and take up your bow as you face off against an army of the Risen, from Skeletons to Undead Dragons. With the gloomy atmosphere and intense gameplay, prepare to test your archery skills as you defend the town on three new maps. Are you ready to join the battle?

name: Eldritch Tactics: Lichtmond
summary: Eldritch Tactics: Lichtmond is a turn-based strategy game based on german folklore. After her untimely demise, the Burgund queen Kriemhild and her allied troops find themselves trapped in the Anderswelt where they face an onslaught of undead creatures as well as their own steadily declining sanity.

name: Electric
summary: Feel like an electrician in a fun logic puzzle game with a view from above - the Electric game.

name: Elysium City
summary: Elysium City is a Yume Nikki fangame. You play as a girl named Anne who is an inventor. In her backyard she managed to invent a machine that allows her to teleport to a different land. The place she arrives to is a city where none of the buildings lead you to different worlds. Unlike traditional fangames, Elysium City has dialogue and detailed characters.

name: Elves Fantasy: Hentai Puzzle
summary: A relaxing puzzle game full of beautiful art featuring sexy elves

name: Elevator Game
summary: There is a girl on the roof of a building and she is about to jump. Hurry to the top of the building by taking the the series of elevators with the right timing to get stop her in time!

name: Elite Status: Platinum Concierge
summary: Find the unfindable and do the impossible? It’s all in a day’s work for you. As a concierge, how far will you go to make billionaires’ dreams come true?

name: Elephants and Snakes and Crocodiles
summary: A Super Mario World romhack created by Morsel.

name: Elemental Empire
summary: An economic 4x strategy in a space filled with magic and procedurally generated planets. Build your own empire and become the sole ruler of a new world. Compete against your friends in multiplayer mode.

name: Elven City Simulator
summary: Revive civilization and save it from mysterious darkness. Story-oriented colony simulator with elvish flavor and indirect control.

name: El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera
summary: Havoc has been unleashed on Miracle City! Scores of skeletons roam the streets terrorizing the citizens. Out of the chaos, Manny and his alter ego El Tigre emerge as the city's last hope. Decide whether to be good or evil. Each action taken in the game will decide the different paths that result in alternate endings to the game.

name: Electronic Stock Trading System
summary: This Stock Trading Simulator is the most comprehensive trading system created. This game is so uncomplicated that anyone can play this simulation. The game is highly recommended for the novice trader and more seasoned traders. Buy and sell over 65 different stocks in 10 different sectors.

name: Elearning Development Intern
summary: The internship life in an E-learning startup company has begun. No matter of which computer you are in front (inside or outside), you only need to work and learn!

name: Elves Jigsaw Puzzle Collection
summary: Solve puzzles with the cutest pictures by relocating, rotating, or swapping different tiles.

name: Elk Simulator
summary: Challenging elk hunting taken to another level! Hunt in one of three world venues to include the United States, Canada or New Zealand. Stalk through the vast photorealistic woodlands and mountains in search of trophy elk. Use your wind detector to make sure you're upwind or your range finder to determine distance to potential targets. And if you're not sure, ask your virtual hunting guide for advice! Who's going to be the next Elk Hunting Legend?

name: Elevatrix
summary: "A first-person indie horror shooter where players solve puzzles on each floor of a haunted building, all while surviving attacks from the undead and racing against the clock."

name: Elfboarders
summary: Battle against your friends as you race down the mountain slope in this multiplayer battle-racing brawler! Play with friends online, through LAN, or try to beat the computers solo. Four player maximum.

name: EleMetals: Deluxe Edition
summary: Pick one of six metalheads and SHRED your friends in this battle royal. Along with the base game, the new player DLC lets you listen to the best ELEMETAL music.

name: Elemental Showdown
summary: Unleash elemental chaos in this thrilling top-down arena party game! Fight using Fire, Water, and Plant elements, strategically switching between them to gain the upper hand. Navigate elemental shifting zones to outsmart your friends and emerge victorious!

name: Electronics Puzzle Lab
summary: Enter the most advanced challenge laboratory of today's games, where electronics and logic merge into challenges that will captivate your mind and awaken the engineer within you!

name: Elite vs. Freedom
summary: Elite vs. Freedom is an action-packed Indie third-person shooter game. In the near future, the Earth is controlled by a global government. Few dare to resist this neo-feudalistic, corporatist, police state. Leading the insurgence, a group known as Freedom takes up the fight.

name: Elevated
summary: Jump into Elevated, an action arcade shooter where you must battle to survive against constant, ever growing waves of robotic enemies. Unlock new weapons, face harder opponents, and smash your friends high scores on the online leaderboards!

name: Elegy
summary: A disabled woman named Robin searches for her missing brother in a post-apocalyptic valley, and makes some surprising discoveries.

name: Electro Magnate
summary: Energy business clicker: buy power generators, batteries and equip a sales office.

name: Elder Lich
summary: Elder Lich is set in a world almost identical to 19th century Earth, except there's magic, undead, Germany is split between a South German Federation, a North German Federation and, between them, a country barely bigger than a city-state, Schadel.

name: Electric Trains
summary: Electric trains is very dynamic and interactive train simulation game with a third-person view. The game has easy and intuitive controls. You can drive the train and control railroad switches ahead your train. Heavy traffic and railroad configuration will make missions more difficult to accomplish. You can transport passengers, coupling and carry cargo rail cars to earn maximum scores.

name: Eldorado Gate Volume 2
summary:
El Dorado Gate is console gaming's first serial RPG series, where each Dreamcast GD-ROM contains 3 seperate (though interrelated) adventures, each telling a story of one of the series' 12 characters. There's 7 volumes in all, the first few introducing the characters whilst the later volumes flesh out how their stories are related, leading to the finale.

Part of Capcom's experiment of serializing an RPG over a year with one part every other month.

name: EleMetals: Death Metal Death Match!
summary:
EleMetals: Death Metal Death Match is a chaotic explosion of demonic local-multiplayer mayhem! Summon one of SIX metalheads with elemental powers and SHRED YOUR FRIENDS in this kick-ass Arcade-like Experience! Requires 2-4 Players - Great for Steam Remote Play!

PULL YOUR EMERGING SOUL TO SURVIVE!
How badass is your button-mashing?? Frantically return your soul to your corpse - though it gets harder each time you die! Don't let your soul leave the Realm, or you'll be Banished from the round.

SUPER FLUID & VERSATILE DASH MECHANIC
Change Direction, Curve, Hover - Dash into enemies to Destroy them, Dash into Shards to deflect them back, or Dash through traps to avoid death! You’re a demon ffs!

YOU'RE GONNA DIE. A LOT.
Deadly realms, Scrolling levels, Unique Traps, and GIGANTIC GODDAMN LAVA TRIDENTS!

Deadly Features!
- CHUCK METAL SHARDS and HEADBANG FOR AMMO!
- PULL YOUR EMERGING SOUL & REVIVE!
- SUPER-FLUID DASH MECHANIC!
- BIG 'OL CHARGED-UP ATTACKS!
- GIGANTIC GODDAMN LAVA TRIDENTS!!
- 6 DEMONIC METALHEAD CHARACTERS!
- 30 PLAYABLE LEVELS ACROSS 3 REALMS OF PAAAAIN!
- REACTIVE METAL SOUND EFFECTS! created by FAT BARD!

name: ELEX: Collector's Edition
summary:
Advanced in technology, civilized and with a population of billions, Magellan was a planet looking to the future. Then the meteor hit. Those who survived are now trapped in a battle to survive, a struggle to decide the fate of a planet. At the center of this fight is the element "Elex". A precious, limited resource that arrived with the meteor, Elex can power machines, open the door to magic, or re-sculpt life into new, different forms. But which of these choices should be the future of Magellan? Can technology, or magic save this world? Or will this new power destroy all those left alive amongst the ruins? 
 
ELEX is an action, role-playing open world game for PC and Consoles, developed by Piranha Bytes, creators of the award winning Gothic series and is set in a brand new, post-apocalyptic, Science-Fantasy universe where magic meets mechs. 
 
Collector's Edition Contents: 
 
Premium Quality Display Box 
Mage Figurine 
Cloth World Map 
Companion Drone Amulet 
Original Soundtrack CD 
The Art of Elex book 
"Making Of" DVD 
Quick start Manual

name: Ele Blaze
summary: Fighting, dodge bullets and traps, Ele Blaze is transverse scrolling game of act, The girl - Nono have powerful Ele energy battling with enemies and stop chaos spreads, save the universe.

name: Elemental: War of Magic
summary: Elemental: War of Magic is a turn-based, fantasy strategy game. The world in Elemental: War of Magic has been destroyed and it is up to you and other so called "channelers" to rebuild it with your magic abilities. The player is represented by a sovereign, which is a unit that can cast spells etc. because he/she is a channeler. You establish cities, research lost knowledge, harvest resources and build armies. There are also RPG elements that let you level up your sovereign and partake in quests.

name: Eldrador Creatures: Shadowfall
summary: The adventure-filled worlds of Eldrador are in danger! Lead battle-ready creatures in turn-based strategic combat to defeat a mysterious shadowy menace.

name: Eldorado Gate Volume 7
summary:
El Dorado Gate is console gaming's first serial RPG series, where each Dreamcast GD-ROM contains 3 seperate (though interrelated) adventures, each telling a story of one of the series' 12 characters. There's 7 volumes in all, the first few introducing the characters whilst the later volumes flesh out how their stories are related, leading to the finale.

Part of Capcom's experiment of serializing an RPG over a year with one part every other month.

name: Elfscape: Ancestors
summary: Elfscape: Ancestors is a story-driven, old-school platformer with RPG elements. Explore a vast underground world centered around an ancient temple city. Jump your way through challenging obstacles, decorate the city, and collect comics pages.

name: Electronic Super Joy 2
summary: Electronic Super Joy 2 is a brutally hard platformer, set in a world of brain-smashing electronic music. Run, jump, smash, & slice your way through 55+ weird & different levels, with giant monsters, swarming missiles & secret areas.

name: Elarel
summary:
A turn based logic puzzle where you must collect all chests while avoiding devilish creatures and traps that could block your progress.

Similar to the 1994 Macintosh game Blobbo by Glenn Andreas.

name: Eliminator Boat Duel
summary: Drivers earn thousands of dollars by competing in hydroplane races, setting track records, rescuing stranded people, and collecting cash bonuses. With these winnings they can repair or upgrade various components of the hydroplane to improve racing performance and remain competitive in the increasingly-difficult races. Eliminator Boat Duel offers three difficulty levels: Easy, Normal, and Expert. Completing a race at a lower difficulty level advances the player to the next higher one. At each difficulty level, the player's hydroplane can be damaged from impact with animals, the opponent's hydroplane, and various stationary objects. A false start is penalized with a $2,000 fine. For most of a race, players control their hydroplanes from a bird's-eye view, and the screen scrolls in multiple directions; but in one segment of the race, the graphical perspective changes to a third-person tracking mode. In a single-player game, the player competes first with Seasick Sidney (in Easy mode), with Aquarius Rex (in Normal mode), or with Surfer Bob (in Expert mode). The player then competes against Vicious Vicky, Weird Willy, Mangler Mike, Veronica Alabaster, and Disaster Don (the reigning World Champion), respectively. To win, the player must defeat each opponent one-against-one on three unique race courses. Eliminator Boat Duel has 24 unique race courses.

name: Elevator Music
summary: You make the elevator go up, go down, go fast, and go slow. And yet, by the end of the week in an old hotel below looming Edelfaustian mountains, you'll have been the deciding factor in either war, or peace.
